{"id":1011182099,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1691068603,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1011182099/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Additions to Make Valid String","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int fxn(string t,string s,int m,int n,vector<vector<int>>&dp){\n        for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){\n            for(int j=1;j<=n;j++){\n                if(s[i-1]==t[j-1]){\n                    dp[i][j]= 1+dp[i-1][j-1];\n                }else{\n                    dp[i][j]= max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[m][n];\n    }\n    \n    int addMinimum(string w) {\n        string s=\"abc\";\n        string t=\"\";\n        map<char,int>mp;\n        for(int i=0;i<w.length();i++){\n            mp[w[i]]++;\n        }\n        int mxm=0;\n        for(auto x:mp){\n            if(x.second>mxm)mxm=x.second;\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<mxm;i++){\n            t+=s;\n        }\n        \n        vector<vector<int>>dp(w.size()+1,vector<int>(t.size()+1,0));\n       int a= fxn(t,w,w.size(),t.size(),dp);\n        return 3*mxm-a;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-additions-to-make-valid-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
